name: domino
author: Felix Gnass <fgnass@gmail.com>
description: Server-side DOM implementation based on Mozilla's dom.js

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.test-spec: npm run lint && npm run mocha-spec
scripts.bump-version: npm version patch -m 'Release domino %s.' && tools/bump-version.js && npm run version && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Bump version after release.'
